name: Probelle Double Sided Multidirectional Nickel Foot File Callus Remover - Immediately Reduces calluses and Corns to Powder for Instant Results, Safe Tool (Dark Grey)
short_description: YOUR SEARCH IS FINALLY OVER – Our premium double sided foot file, designed for beginners and heavy-duty use, features two long-lasting nickel metal surfaces that effectively remove calluses and rough skin, leaving your feet soft and beautiful. Perfect for cracked heels and home pedicures.

BEST THING FOR CRACKED HEELS – This nickel callus remover for feet is a top-rated foot care tool. Its durable handle and weight make it easy to use, ensuring a comfortable grip and efficient callus removal. You'll love the results from this heel care tool.

2 SIDES FOR EASY TRIMMING – Our double-sided foot file features both medium and coarse sides. Start with the coarse side for heavy-duty callus removal and finish with the medium side for a smooth, polished finish. It's like having a dremel grinder for your feet.

EASY TO CLEAN AND HYPOALLERGENIC – Made with hypoallergenic materials, our premium foot scraper is non-cutting and easy to clean. This safe foot care tool ensures your feet stay healthy and soft, avoiding skin damage while reducing calluses to powder.

FOR THE SOFTEST FEET YOU'VE EVER HAD – Achieve the softest feet with our high-quality nickel-based callus remover. This foot file effectively removes calluses and corns without harming healthy skin. Probelle's foot file is your ideal replacement for a pumice stone, foot scrubber, or other pedicure tools.

name: 3 Swords Germany Brand Quality Foot File Made from German Beech Wood, Two-Sided Smooth and Rough, Hard Skin Callus Removal
short_description: 3 Swords Germany wooden foot file made from German beech, stable, light and ergonomically shaped. The filing paper "Chocolate" with 2 different grit sizes, stands out through its long lasting abrasiveness.

Use as often as needed, this highly qualitative wooden foot file is ideal for the gentle removal of hard skin and calluses. Featuring new double sided abrasive coating , it offers a long-lasting performance due to the special grit type.
The rough side is abrasive to help smooth away stubborn hard skin. The smooth side provides gentle exfoliation, achieving a softer, more refined skin.
Gently buff away the patches and calluses without irritating the skin. Ist shape allows a better grip. The wooden handle is curved to fit the contours on the hand.
The best results are obtained when the file is dry. Clean by washing under running water. Last but not least: Natural beech wood from sustainably managed Bavarian forests in Germany.
